EmailTemplate.name: Test Supplier Onboarding Initial Email Custom
EmailTemplate.subject: Supplier Onboarding Next Steps
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Supplier__c.Name__c},
Thanks for registering to be a supplier, your partner id is {!Supplier__c.PartnerID__c}.
Below are the next steps before you can be approved.
Please sign our NDA at https://app.hellosign.com/s/2AY1eIWE and finish your profile at work.xometry.com.
Request your test part at https://pages.xometry.com/request-test-part?partner_id={!Supplier__c.PartnerID__c}&email={!Supplier__c.EmailAddress__c}. This link is individual to you please do not share.
Thank you,
Xometry Operations Team
